description: 「Diān fēng」 means peak, top, or pinnacle. 「Diān fēng zhào piàn」 means 「best shot」 or 「peak photo」.

examples.chinese: 你认为这个系列哪部才是巅峰之作呢
examples.translation: Which one do you think is the pinnacle work of this series?

examples.chinese: 我就觉得佳能 EOS R5 Mark II堪称影像技术的巅峰之作
examples.translation: I feel that the Canon EOS R5 Mark II can be called a masterpiece of imaging technology.

examples.chinese: 宫崎骏的巅峰之作《千与千寻》老少皆宜,引人入胜
examples.translation: Hayao Miyazaki's masterpiece 「Spirited Away」 is suitable for all ages and fascinating.
